verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I need You more,
More than yesterday.
I need You more,
More than words can say.
I need You more,
Than ever before.
I need you more.
I need you, Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
More than the air I breathe,
More than the song I sing,
More than the next heartbeat,
More than anything.
And Lord as time goes by
I will be by Your side,
'Cause I never want to go back
To my old life.
